title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.5 - Directions of police officers or parks corporation employees; park signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.5 - Directions of police officers or parks corporation employees; park signs

State Regulations
(a) No person shall
fail, neglect or refuse to comply with the lawful direction or command of any
police officer or designated employee of ParksCorp or the BPCA, indicated by
gesture or otherwise. (b) No person
shall fail to comply with or obey any instruction, direction, regulation, warning, or prohibition, written or printed, displayed or appearing on any park
sign, except such sign may be disregarded upon order by a police officer or
designated ParksCorp or BPCA employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
